com.ubtechinc.cruzr.serverlibutil.interfaces

Interface RemoteStatusListener


  • public interface RemoteStatusListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onResult(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> stack, boolean change, int status)
      call this method when status machine changed
      void onStatusFree(int laststatus)
      当前状态机空闲时回调此方法
      call this method when status machine is empty
      void onStatusPause(int pausedStatus, int pausedByStatus, java.lang.String sponsor)
      pause回调，一般为另一个状态强迫当前应用的状态下线所触发的回调
      call this method when a status need to be paused by another status

    • Method Detail

      • onResult

        void onResult(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> stack,
              boolean change,
              int status)
        call this method when status machine changed
        Parameters:
        stack - 当前状态值集合
        Current state set
        change - 默认为空无状态
        The default is empty
        status - 新增状态值
        Added status
        See Also:
        SystemStatus

      • onStatusPause

        void onStatusPause(int pausedStatus,
                   int pausedByStatus,
                   java.lang.String sponsor)
        pause回调，一般为另一个状态强迫当前应用的状态下线所触发的回调
        call this method when a status need to be paused by another status
        Parameters:
        pausedStatus - 被暂停的状态id
        pausedByStatus - 触发暂停的状态id
        sponsor - 发起者的包名

      • onStatusFree

        void onStatusFree(int laststatus)
        当前状态机空闲时回调此方法
        call this method when status machine is empty
        Parameters:
        laststatus - 最后一个状态id
